titleStmt.title: A continuation of the proceedings of the Scots army before Hereford: together with a relation of their pursuing the enemie: certified in a letter dated at the leager before Hereford. August 11. 1645. Published by authority.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.B. for Robert Bostock at the Kings head in Pauls Churchyard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings head in Pauls Churchyard.
